Sentencas: Y-doped BaCeO3 (BCY), a solid state ion conductor which exhibits mixed proton and oxide ion conductivity under some conditions, was used as an electrolyte in a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Measurement of proton and oxide ion fluxes in a working Y-doped BaCeO3SOFC

Sentencas: The conductivities of 10% and 25% Y-doped BaCeO3 (BCY10 and BCY25) were measured under a single gas atmosphere of 5% hydrogen in argon (5% H2/Ar), air and pure argon (Ar).
Titulo: Measurement of proton and oxide ion fluxes in a working Y-doped BaCeO3SOFC

Sentencas: Furthermore, a dual-chamber SOFC reactor was used to investigate the conductivities of the BCY10 and BCY25 electrolytes under fuel cell conditions, i.e., 5% hydrogen in argon at the anode with air at the cathode.
Titulo: Measurement of proton and oxide ion fluxes in a working Y-doped BaCeO3SOFC

Sentencas: The performance of BCY-based SOFC with Pt electrodes was measured over a temperature range of 500-800 degrees C using a galvanostat/potentiostat.
Titulo: Measurement of proton and oxide ion fluxes in a working Y-doped BaCeO3SOFC

Sentencas: Both anode and cathode product stream compositions were analysed using a gas chromatograph and a hygrometer.
Titulo: Measurement of proton and oxide ion fluxes in a working Y-doped BaCeO3SOFC

Sentencas: A material balance for the system was performed in order to estimate proton and oxygen ion fluxes across the electrolyte.
Titulo: Measurement of proton and oxide ion fluxes in a working Y-doped BaCeO3SOFC

Sentencas: Water transport across the electrolyte in the absence of an external circuit was also studied.
Titulo: Measurement of proton and oxide ion fluxes in a working Y-doped BaCeO3SOFC
